mapper.insert: insert into umconfig (CONFIGID, PARENTID, CFGCODE, CFGNAME, CFGVALUE, EDITABLE, SHOWORDER, MEMO) values (#{configid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update umconfig set PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFGCODE = #{cfgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFGNAME = #{cfgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFGVALUE = #{cfgvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDITABLE = #{editable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONFIGID = #{configid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CONFIGID, PARENTID, CFGCODE, CFGNAME, CFGVALUE, EDITABLE, SHOWORDER, MEMO from umconfig
